name: modaledit-line-indicator
description: Dynamic line highlight for ModalEdit normal/insert modes. Changes line highlight color based on current mode for instant visual feedback.

modaledit-line-indicator.enabled.description: Enable or disable the line highlight indicator

modaledit-line-indicator.normalModeBackg.description: Background color for normal mode line highlight (hex format)

modaledit-line-indicator.normalModeBorde.description: Border color for normal mode line highlight (hex format)

modaledit-line-indicator.insertModeBackg.description: Background color for insert mode line highlight (hex format)

modaledit-line-indicator.insertModeBorde.description: Border color for insert mode line highlight (hex format)

modaledit-line-indicator.highlightCurren.description: If true, only highlight the current cursor line. If false, highlight all lines.

modaledit-line-indicator.borderStyle.description: Border style for the line highlight

modaledit-line-indicator.borderWidth.description: Border width for the line highlight

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
